title: Can someone who wants to start a k-pop group request an entertainment company to make a k-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: You want an entertainment company to sponsor a random person’s kpop group? You can request as much as you want the chances of it happening would be pretty slim. The only cases I can see this working is. You’re from a rich, influential family(chaebol) & your parents put in the request to one of their business friends. Basically you buy your fame.You make the request to a small, poor company. You present them a group of good-looking & talented people & prove that you’re all ready for debut & they won’t have to spend a cent for training. Better be amazing.You & your group have already somewhat debut & are popular in entertainment circles. You make a name for yourself & make connections with influential people in the idol industry. Again you’ll have to do most of the work & prove to these companies that you’re worth their time & money.
